pages.text:
&n&6&lDimension:&r&r    &n&lUndergarden&r
&n&6&lArea Level:&r&r    &n25 - 40 &r&r
&n&6&lEnraged Area Level:&r &n60 - 80&r
&n&6&lExceptions:&r  &nNone&r
&n&6&lQuests covered:&r  &nAct III;&r
&n&6&lDimension gateways:&r  &nAct III Gateway;
&n&6&lDimension Bosses:&r &nFerrous Wroughtnaut; Umvuthi, the Sunbird; Tongbi, the Sculptor; Forgotten Guardian; Eel &r

&n&6&l차원:&r&r    &n&l언더가든(UnderGarden)&r
&n&6&l구역 레벨:&r&r    &n25 - 40 &r&r
&n&6&l강화된 구역 레벨:&r &n60 - 80&r
&n&6&l예외:&r  &n없음&r
&n&6&l퀘스트:&r  &n액트 III;&r
&n&6&l차원 관문 :&r  &n엑트 III 관문;
&n&6&l이 차원의 보스들:&r &n거대 연철기사(Ferrous Wroughtnaut); 태양의 새 움브티(Umvuthi, The Sunbird); 조각가 통비(Tongbi, the Sculptor); 잊혀진 수호자(Forgotten Guardian); 장어(Eel) &r

오버월드의 늪지 만큼 습기가 있지만 밀실 공포증과 징그러움이 느껴지는 차원입니다.$(br) 이곳의 Creatures here seem to be some kind of mutated rotting beasts after being affected by some virulent liquid that burns when touched. I've managed to find some traces of massive Knights and Guardians each having their own structure.$(br) It seems there is also a cult of strange masked creatures that are somewhat resistant to magic damage, so travelers should be careful around them.

pages.title: Getting into the Undergarden
pages.text:
If you are looking to get to this dimension you need to lay your hands on&n&l at least 10 Stone Bricks and a Catalyst crafted from a Nether star (check recipe in EMI/JEI)&r.
  &oCorner blocks are completely optional but they would grant &2+5 to Aestetics&r stat if it exsisted

pages.name: Undergarden Portal
pages.text: Click on eye icon to visualize portal in game
